attributes.action: Enable a program of Apprenticeships for boys and girls in the Building industry connected with the 2012 Olympics and Brownfield re generation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The figure of 9 Billion has been given to the general public as a cost to the 2012 Olympics, the benefits are portrayed as a legacy ie re-generation
and sporting....perhaps another legacy needs to be looked at...the opportunity for youngsters who live around nearby boroughs to be given a
chance to train in the multitude of trades needed for the construction of the 2012 Olympics.
This opportunity for a lasting legacy
of employment for youngsters must not
be lost.
